channel.title: [HELP]My server making
channel.description:
ok, ive read ALL of the tutorials on how to make a server. i have got my source and i have edited what i want. but i dont know how to change my server name. I need to know how to get my IP. ok ill tell you what ive done so far.
1.i got pimpscape 2.i made myself admin 3.i made npcs 4.i spawned monsters 5.i made a few npcs shops
what i mean by name is like make it says welcome to _________ and on the side have like ________server and like how many people are on. also i need to know how to let people on.
[b]I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO MAKE AN IP!!![/b] :eek:
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ REALLY NEED THAT ONE.

item.title: [HELP]My server making
item.dc:creator: @SLITER.8 SLITER.8
item.description:
@SLITER.8 wrote:

[quote=“Solid snake, post:2, topic:163736”]u got no-ip.duc form no-ip.org then log in go to the bottom and look for make host then make it ******.servegame.com (it doesnt need to me servegame)

then make it refresh ur no-ip duc then u have to mark the box beside ur servername bam its made[/quote]

thanks

Read full topic
